name: Instant Hot Pack
descr:
Chiroform Instant Hot Pack.

Specifications:

6"X9" (15.3cm X 25.4cm)

Simply squeeze the pouch to activate the heat. It can reach a high temperature of 54 celsius degrees and lasts approximately 15-30 minutes.
This one-time use heat pack is convenient and portable, for use whenever and wherever hot therapy is needed.

1pcs/Box and 48pcs/carton.
